metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7995 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The xsltStylePreCompute function in preproc.c in libxslt 1.1.28 does not check if the parent node is an element, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted XML file, related to a "type confusion" issue.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7995` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxslt1.1 - 1.1.28-2.1
python-libxslt1 - 1.1.28-2.1
xsltproc - 1.1.28-2.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> reproducer in Red Hat bug

criterions.comment: libxslt package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.28-2.1').
